Reviews.Title: Great, smooth and crisp TV- perfect for up close gaming!
Reviews.Author: Xalidar
Reviews.Content: This TV is much more than I needed. Was cheapest price for 1080p, good size for up close gaming, and fit perfectly on my desk! Now I get to play all my games in HD, and if necessary can hook it up to my computer for dual monitor action. The TV has actually decent sound for the size- I find myself just shelving my headphones most of the time due to comfortability.Coby has shined to me so far, as I've bought a few products of theirs and have been very happy with them. Keep up the good work!

Reviews.Title: Great TV but with flaws
Reviews.Author: SMXSteve
Reviews.Content: Update: While the TV still works it has a very annoying problem. Occassionally the channels need to be re-scanned. I have found this to be true on another brand we have. The problem is you lose all of your favorites and channel settings. Setting them up on this unit is really a pain in the butt and very time consuming.-----------------------------------------------------------------We bought this TV for the bedroom. Hooked it up to basic cable, plugged it in, easily found the menu and selected scan. Took about 5 minutes but it not only found all of the analog stations but an additional 60 digital channels. We have basic cable with no box so this was a surprise for us. It is initially bright but after some adjustment the picture quality for digital is pretty good for this price range.However, there are two major flaws. The speakers for this thing are par for what you get with any TV/monitor like this. The problem is you can't just add a set of external speakers. The only outlet is coaxil which requires an amplifier. This is not a TV you want to keep adding additional expenses.The other small but major flaw is that while you can turn the power light off while watching TV, the power light comes ON when the unit is off. Their tech support calls this sleep mode and say it is dim but in the bedroom at night it is very annoying.

Reviews.Title: Great set for the price
Reviews.Author: David "David"
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a TV for viewing from about 4 feet away (next to my desk). Fine picture and OK sound. Easy to set up. Auto-find found digital channels without a cable box. Decided to try it as a monitor for a small laptop computer. Perfect, crystal clear picture. Am now using as a computer monitor and will buy another for the TV. Hard to beat the price for 1080p LED.Free shipping was slow from Amazon on this and it arrived 4 days late, but TV great for the price.December 7, 2011 follow up: I purchased a second unit for use as a computer monitor (it has VGA input plug). Worked great for about 3 weeks, then would shut off when warm and computer screen went blank for standby mode. Only way to get it to restart was to unplug power for half an hour or so (to cool off??) then reconnect power. Coby warranty is horrible, only 90 days and $25 shipping each way.Amazon was absolutely great! They allowed a return even though I initiated the request 2 days outside the 30-day window (because I troubleshot for a week until I gave up). Amazon immediately, with no hassle or discussion, allowed a return and gave me a prepaid shipping label. I could not ask for more. I was so pleased with Amazon I am ordering another Coby TV from them because I trust them to take it back if it is defective within a very short time.The TV is great when it works, but now I have one out of two which was defective. First one is working great and is currently my monitor while I wait for new Coby to arrive.

Reviews.Title: Coby LEDTV2226
Reviews.Author: J. Toso "JT"
Reviews.Content: Nice basic TV.  Made in the USA, nice picture, slim, light, and perfect for any small bedroom or room in general.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working after 8 mo's; warranty is only 6 mo's
Reviews.Author: ER
Reviews.Content: After owning this TV for 9 months, it stopped working. I was extremely disappointed when the company stated they would fix the television only after I paid to return the TV, sent a $25.00 money order to Coby to cover return shipping costs, and a separate $25.00 money order for labor. I strongly recommend you purchase from a more reputable company!

Reviews.Title: Two Duds, Don't Sucked in by the Price
Reviews.Author: S. Turner
Reviews.Content: Looking for a cheap TV for the kitchen, this seemed like a solid deal. I didn't need all the bells and whistles from a name brand, just something that worked. Unfortunately, after two straight have ended in a non-functioning TV, I can't recommend this product at all.The first TV came with a purple line right down the middle of it. I was informed that the set was bad and to return it for a new one in which I did. The next TV worked fine for about two weeks before it would no longer power on. At this point, it's just not worth the hassle of dealing with this brand and model.Perhaps I just have incredibly bad luck, but I don't think the hassle is worth saving a few bucks. I'll be sticking to more name brand products and dropping a few bucks more.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for what I need!
Reviews.Author: Hector
Reviews.Content: I use this TV for when i'm recording video game footage onto YouTube. It's not too small, its bigger than my computer screen, so its perfect to put it side by side next to my computer. I don't suggest buying this for a main room. But if you want to use it for a small room, its perfect.

Reviews.Title: Decent small tv for the money
Reviews.Author: K. Milne
Reviews.Content: I bought this and two of the Coby 19" TV's for the bedrooms. The picture is really good, HD looks really sharp and the color is vibrant. One of the 19" tv's doubles as a desktop computer monitor and works fine for that as well. If you do use the monitor function, you'll have to spend a little time in the display settings finding the right resolution and font size for the image to render in a way that is acceptable. The only caveat: the sound is really pretty bad and sounds like it's coming out of a tin can. :-( But, I read the other reviews and knew about this in advance. After all, how big could the speakers be on such a small and thin tv? Where would they put them? Personally, I think the small, down-firing speakers are fine for treble and mid-range, but the tv's sound could be vastly improved if they (and other small tv manufacturers) could put a large back-firing speaker in the rear for the bass. It would add that needed low range that is missing in these small sets. Great set for a small bedroom or on the wall facing a treadmill or similar. So far, so good after almost 30 days, and all three tv's with articulating wall mounts were under $500! :-)4/30/2012:All three sets are still working great, and I've increased the bass and decreased the treble and they sound less tinney, but the sound is still lacking and could be improved.  Overall, still four stars.

Reviews.Title: cody tv
Reviews.Author: kertaj catise
Reviews.Content: i was looking for a tv monitor on a budget this is super affordable and its so easy to set up it has tons of features that i like. i live in the caribbean and it works on our 220v electricity without a converter and that to me is a plus. i have used it both as a monitor and as a tv and it works great both ways. i would recommend u buy it.

Reviews.Title: Works Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Nathan Huff
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived fast and in perfect condition.  It is a great TV for areas like a dorm room or small house rooms.

Reviews.Title: Coby 22-inch LED TV 1080p
Reviews.Author: THOMAS F JONES
Reviews.Content: Product was exactly as advertised and arrived in a timely fashion. Great deal for the price. I probably would not buy that small a screen in the future.  But that does not diminish the quality of the product.

Reviews.Title: BEWARE, not as advertised
Reviews.Author: Specialist K
Reviews.Content: clearly stated as being 120 hertz in the listing but it is 60 hertz. also, a good vga plug came through with some noise with this tv, hdmi being fine. was happy to find a small tv that was 120 hertz for this price but it was too good to be true. SECOND different unit i've bought with the wrong hertz listed.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, unusable volume
Reviews.Author: Steven Daugherty "guitarer"
Reviews.Content: I read an earlier review that referred to the "great sound" of this TV - they must have been reviewing a different model! Without an external amplifier, I wouldn't have kept this TV, I couldn't make out dialogue from across a small room, at FULL volume. There IS a coaxial output for an amplifier, BUT, IF (as in my case) you hook the TV up to an HDMI cable, the coax output doesn't work (it's only for the built-in tuner). It's no problem to hook up the external amp to the RCA jacks on the HD box & TV, but then you have no remote volume control/mute (unless you have a remote-controlled amp, which I don't). I may look into another very small amp with a remote, it's a hassle as-is.Otherwise, this TV is fantastic for the price, the picture is incredible & setup with my HD box was very simple. Just anticipate the audio issues; the use of an external stereo for sound is a vast improvement for most any TV, for this one it's a necessity.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: streetsense
Reviews.Content: Great tv. Worked great right out of the box. Easy to setup. Hooked up to the cable. Getting a lot more channels than my old crt tv. Excellent picture and sound. Only thing I would like to see better is the size of the onscreen menue prompts and choices. Print is a little small. Maybe there is a way to adjust the size. Otherwise, it is a great tv at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Best investment in our lives
Reviews.Author: J. Ochoa "Beautifull baby girl's mom"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV for my 2 and a half year old, she likes all Dora and Barney and the rest of the gang, and the living room TV was taking a toll on our news time, the Coby LED was the definite answer, she plays her DVD's there she call us to dande in front of it, she is so independent and this set confirmed so, I recomend this set to anyone who wants great image/sound. Great second set.Coby LEDTV2226 22-Inch 1080p HDMI LED TV/Monitor, Black

Reviews.Title: Work fine for the areas I use them
Reviews.Author: Nellie DuBose
Reviews.Content: I have one for a bedroom and one in the kitchen and they work fine for these areas would purchase again for this type of area

Reviews.Title: I recommend
Reviews.Author: Andrew Nottage
Reviews.Content: I like the display and performance of this TV. The sound volume and quality are good as well. I just wish that the buttons were on the front panel instead of hidden in the back and that the LED is off when the TV is off (it's on when the TV is off and turns off when you turn on the TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: MTG
Reviews.Content: This television is good viewing and nice color.  Hung on the wall for viewing.  Sound is good and the picture is as good as some of the other TV's that cost more.  I am happy with it.

Reviews.Title: good quality TV
Reviews.Author: Ronald A. Birke "Ron B"
Reviews.Content: This is a good quality TV. The size is just what I wanted for a bedroom. The price was very reasonable.

Reviews.Title: Good Tv, sound needs a little help though
Reviews.Author: MrCC678
Reviews.Content: It is a nice tv, you can mount it or put it on it's stand (included). It has every modern connection and is very smart, it is light weight and thin. As you see in the title however the only thing that is kind of a bummer is the sound, it doesn't have the best sound, you can't hear the "fine" sounds especially when you are watching your favorite movie on blue ray. It has great picture quality, alot of connection options but when it comes to sound you will probably want some kind of external sound system to get the best sound quality. If sound is not a big issue and you are using it more to view TV maybe, then the sound that comes out of this TV is fine.

Reviews.Title: Coby TV
Reviews.Author: Geoge
Reviews.Content: This is my office television.  It works great and gives me a good picture and adequate sound for my small office. The TV was delivered in about three days and arrived in good condition.  It was new and I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: P. Nichols
Reviews.Content: Have had no problems,great set picture,sound,speedy delivery,as described,could not ask for a better set. easy set up,works great with laptop

Reviews.Title: Worked wonderfully ALMOST a year
Reviews.Author: aLaw
Reviews.Content: This TV worked beautifully for almost a year. Daily use with TV watching & game playing. It went out all of a sudden with a white picture a few days ago. I just went to see when I purchased it. It's almost been a year on the 26 of Sept. You could still hear the sound though, but no picture. Call it how you see it.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: M B
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price. I've been using it as a second TV/computer monitor in my bedroom. Perfect size for the bedromm(at least for me). Speakers are terrible, however.

Reviews.Title: Carlito
Reviews.Author: carlos1030
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this product, very beautiful picture will recommend.I would of give it 5 star but I  just got this item about month ago

Reviews.Title: Not LOUD enough!
Reviews.Author: Ellen S Spiegel
Reviews.Content: Nice looking unit but mine seems to have defective sound as the volume doesn't seem to increase once past the lowest levels.  Also the 1080p resolution isn't there with my HDMI hookup (only 720p)  Not certain if I will keep it, but giving it a few days of use before I make up my mind.  I suppose for $180 it isn't too bad for my kitchen use, but I am disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Good Tv but not good to me
Reviews.Author: Kmac
Reviews.Content: The tv played wonderfully after it was hooked up to the cable. I watched for a day and the next, channels 3 nor 4 were compatible anymore. My cable service provider came by and advised I have a 2 week old tv repaired. Instead it was returned. When it played it was good.. In the end, it wasn't good to me.
